```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)

data("instacart")

top_fruits = instacart|>
  filter(aisle == "fresh fruits")|>
  count(product_name, sort = TRUE) |>
  top_n(10, wt = n)|>
  pull(product_name)

top_fruits_df =  instacart |>
  filter(aisle == "fresh fruits", product_name %in% top_fruits)

hourly_sales <- top_fruits_df |>
  group_by(product_name,order_hour_of_day) |>
  summarize(sales = n()) |>
  arrange(order_hour_of_day)
```

  layout(title = "Top 20 Most Ordered Fruits")
